mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture(lectureNum, memberEmail, categoryCode, lectureSubject, lectureContent, lecturePrice, regDate, dcPercent, lectureDuration, thumbNail, lectureState) VALUES(#{lectureNum}, #{memberEmail}, #{categoryCode}, #{lectureSubject}, #{lectureContent}, #{lecturePrice}, SYSDATE, #{dcPercent}, #{lectureDuration}, #{thumbNail}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT lectureNum, lectureEmail, categoryCode, lectureSubject, lectureContent, lecturePrice, reg_date, dcPercent, lectureState, lectureDuration, thumbNail FROM lecture WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
SELECT categoryCode, categoryName FROM category WHERE mainCategory IS NULL
SELECT categoryCode, mainCategory, categoryName FROM category WHERE mainCategory = #{categoryCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lectureVideoFile(lectureNum, videoNum, fileTotalTime, videoTitle, chapter, videoFileName) VALUES(#{lectureNum}, lectureVideoFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{fileTotalTime}, #{videoTitle}, #{chapter}, #{videoFileName})
